snippet: We chart the success of Renzo Rosso, the co-founder of Diesel. Rosso, now worth an estimated $3 billion, was a farmer’s son who made his first pair on jeans on his mother’s sewing machine.
lead_paragraph: We chart the success of Renzo Rosso, the co-founder of Diesel. Rosso, now worth an estimated $3 billion, was a farmer’s son who made his first pair on jeans on his mother’s sewing machine.
